plot: Behind the walls of a Syrian hammam, two young women bathe and share confidences about desire, longing for love and the struggle for identity in a society undergoing change.
title: En sort streg om øjet
plot_es: Behind the walls of a Syrian hammam, two young women bathe and share confidences about desire, longing for love and the struggle for identity in a society undergoing change.
plot_en: Behind the walls of a Syrian hammam, two young women bathe and share confidences about desire, longing for love and the struggle for identity in a society undergoing change.
